title: kaadal kaadal kaadal
sahitya:
kAdal kAdal kAdal kAdal pOyirk-kAdal pOyirk-shAdal shAdal shAdal

caraNam 1

 aruLEyA nalvoLiyiE oLI pOmAyin oLi pOmAyin iruLE irulE iruLE

caraNam 2

 inbam inbam inbam inbattirk-kOr ellai kANil tunbam tunbam tunbam

caraNam 3

 nAdam nAdam nAdam nAdattEyOr nali uNDAyin shEdam shEdam shEdam

caraNam 4

 tALam tALam tALam tALattirk-kOr taDai uNDAyin kULam kULam kULam

caraNam 5

 paNNE paNNE paNNE paNNIrkkEyOr pazhuduNDAyin maNNE maNNE maNNE

caraNam 6

 pugazhE pugazhE pugazhE pugazhukkEyOr purai uNDAyin igazhE igazhE igazhE

caraNam 7

 urudi urudi urudi urudikkEyOr uDai uNDAyin irudi irudi irudi

caraNam 8

 kUDal kUDal kUDal kUDip-pinnE kumarar pOyin vADal vADal vADal

caraNam 9

 kuzhalE kuzhalE kuzhalE kuzhalirk-kIral kUDum kAlai vizhalE vizhalE vizhalE
